name: t3f5
description: A Pyrogram Telegram bot to access Telegram Files via the web.

ENV.description: Set this to True if you don't want to crash the bot

APP_NAME.description: Copy-Paste the app name that you just typed above.

BIN_CHANNEL.description: The BIN Channel ID. Read the readme for more info about this var

WORKERS.description: Number of workers that is to be assigned. Read the readme for more info about this var

PING_INTERVAL.description: The time in ms you want the servers to be pinged each time to avoid sleeping.

FQDN.description: Read the readme for more info about this var

DATABASE_URL.description: MongoDB URI for saving User IDs when they first Start the Bot. We will use that for Broadcasting to them. I will try to add more features related with Database. If you need help to get the URI you can ask in Support Group: https://t.me/linux_repo

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Update Channel shown with Start Text

FORCE_UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Set to True, so every user have to Join update channel to use the bot.

SESSION_NAME.description: Session Name for Bot [ Add AvishkarPatil ]

BANNED_CHANNELS.description: Put IDs of Banned Channels where bot will not work. You can add multiple IDs & separate with Space.

PAGE_LINK.description: Your stream link, Return message_id, hash, mime_type as get request
